preqs: ECB1102 or ECF1200 or ECG1102 or ECS1102 or ECW1102

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECB1102, ECF1200, ECG1102, ECS1102, ECW1102} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course version {2224, 3806, 3831, 4423, 4436}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ECF2331, ECS2730, ECW2730}

description: This unit examines the scope for policy to improve macroeconomic performance. It will cover: the cyclical behaviour of the economy; the role of monetary, fiscal and exchange rate policies in influencing economic activities; the implementation and operation of monetary policy; the relationship of exchange rates to monetary policy; major factors determining movements in interest rates and exchange rates in both the intermediate and long terms.
